<Link id="l00022" /><CodeLine lineNumber="22"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Decode a packed BCD value.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00023" /><CodeLine lineNumber="23"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Maximum value of int64&#95;t is 9,223,372,036,854,775,807. These are 18 usable</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00024" /><CodeLine lineNumber="24"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// decimal digits. Thus BCD numbers of up to 9 bytes can be converted.</span></CodeLine>
